statements.expression:
Transform( 
	TrfGameWithTopic,
	RdsSelectReader(
    	QuizzesDatabase.Game, 
        [
        	RdsConditional(gameId == ^args.gameId, !IsNull(^args.gameId)), 
            RdsConditional(topicId == ^args.topicId, !IsNull(^args.topicId)),
            RdsConditional( RdsLike( topic.name, "%" + ^args.topicName + "%" ), !IsNull( ^args.topicName ) ),
            RdsConditional( RdsLike( playerName, "%" + ^args.playerName + "%" ), !IsNull( ^args.playerName ) )
        ], 
        gameId, 
        ^args.offset, 
        ^args.limit
	)
)

parameters.name: offset
parameters.remarks: Requested index for start the results to be provided in response.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.remarks: Requested number results to be provided in response.

routing.remarks: Allows to get a list of Games.
